body: I totally agree with the guys this ain't ntr and its smart that they didn't include the tag ntr cause the difference between ntr and cheating is just huge . Its not that the husband wasn't satisfying her or some bs shit but its just that she is one of the most irredeemable whore/slut ever
She's an irredeemable cunt. Not the worst I've seen but definitely in the bottom tier. I hoped she'd get her comeuppance but she never does, too bad
This woman is really something else
Sooo, how did ending up with the mail man become a good ending?

The fuck’s up with the last part dude... Mom becomes sex slave of Son?? It’s her fault all that happened, what a whore, and she says she’s been waiting for it as well... on the upside, the illustrations were top-notch.

what is that letter mean?

There might be those kind of people in reality man just fuck humanity thanks a lot for this doujin to made me realize that

One of the few NTR that doesn't make me lose my mind with rage and I'm not entirely sure why. Probably because the husband was implied to be having an affair too.

That said, I've become quite numb to NTR lately. Idk if it's because they're all the same mindbreak BS or if it's cause the one's I've read the male victim hardly exists.
at the end, if you see that mother's hair style for dead  :3
Worthless whore.
That's a whole lot of NTR
trash

I find a twisted sense of karma with this series
She fucks two other men thinking she'll get away with it scot free
But then the tan child stands out so fucking obvious that she more than likely faced a harsh as hell divorce after her husband ordered a DNA test as a sudden appearance of blond hair is fishier than the fucking ocean itself when the guy finally pays attention or the son eventually rats her out after some time 

And then to add on top of that the orginal son makes her his sex slave, full on slave at this point, and once she gets way too old and flappy, he will rat her out, or might even kill her, the mother that betrayed her husband will get what she deserve from how this comic ended. Or she lives the rest of her life as her son's sex slave, either or, though the first scenario is much more interesting.

Though the scenes were a good fap the story itself was interesting as well
I congratulate the author on a job well done
